organization.name: Vitebsk State Academy of Veterinary Medicine

person.name: Subbotin, A.M., Vitebsk State Academy of Veterinary Medicine (Belarus)

organization.name: Vitebsk State Academy of Veterinary Medicine (Belarus)

abstract.value: The book represents the data connected with neoascaris vitulorum and disease of cattle, caused by this pathogenic agent. Biological features of  neoascaris vitulorum, development of the nematode in the animal's organisms, egg development in the summer period in various types of soils in the Republic of Belarus are analyzed. Neoascaris vitulorum spread in Belarus according to the direction of production activity of farms is researched.  Peculiarities of epizootic process of cattle, infested with neoascaris vitulorum along with dynamics of morphological blood parameters of calves, spontaneously invaded with neoascaris vitulorum are studied. Protein metabolism disorders during morbid affection with neoascaris vitulorum and other associative parasitic diseases are analyzed; vitamin and mineral metabolism, enzyme activity, the state of the pigment and carbohydrate metabolism, development of the pathological process in cattle, infested with neoascaris vitulorum are measured. Effectiveness of anthelmintics' application for the prevention of parasitic infection of cattle is evaluated. Economic efficiency of some medicinal substances is analyzed.
